pkgmetadata.longdescription: Continuous Time Causal Models // Implements the semiparametric efficient estimators of continuous-time causal models for time- varying treatments and confounders in the presence of dependent censoring (including structural failure time model and Cox proportional hazards marginal structural model). S. Yang, K. Pieper, and F. Cools (2019) doi:10.1111/biom.12845.
